Name: Will Glow the Wisp
About the game: WISHLIST MY NEXT GAME DESCRIPTION Features Simple but deep mechanics Play vs. another players recordings Beat the Developer Global Highscore Lots of Particles and Bullets Beat the Developer You are able to play against the Developer in Will Glow the Wisp, but only the best players will be able to handle this challenge. Do you want to give it a try? Play vs Content Creators (Games Journalist, Youtubers, Streamers…) We love all content creators that is why you can play against recordings of content creators. Content creators get visibility by having a separate Highscore and people are able to get to their linked homepage, driving additional traffic to the content creators.
